SEARCH
Package com.project.moviebooking.controller

Class MovieController

java.lang.Object
com.project.moviebooking.controller.MovieController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/movie") public class MovieController extends Object
This is a controller class for the creation of movies. The API requests for movies are declared here. The method to create movies and get movies by different parameters are present here.

    Field

  • Method Details

    • createMovie

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,Object>> createMovie(@RequestBody MovieRequest movieRequest)
      This method is for the creation of movie which can only be done by admins.
      Parameters:
      movieRequest - Contains the information of the movie that needs to be created.
      Returns:
      A created movie body is returned if the movie is created successfully along with message otherwise in the case of error only error message is returned.

    • getMovieByMovieName

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,Object>> getMovieByMovieName(@RequestParam String movieName, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size)
      This method is used to get the movies by the name of the movie.
      Parameters:
      movieName - This is the name of the movie.
      page - This is the page number for the pagination purpose.
      size - This is the size of each page the pagination purpose.
      Returns:
      A list with all the movie information is returned along with a message otherwise in the case of any error only the error message is returned. A list is returned because there can be many movies with the exact same name.
